title: What can I do if the headset plug is loose, the headset won't plug in all the way, or only the background music can be heard and the melody is too quiet?
answer: Make sure the four metal sections on the headset plug are completely inserted into the headset plug opening. When the last section is plugged in there may be a popping sound as the plug is inserted into position. When the headset is completely plugged in, check if the sound is normal.
